affiliation.address: Stationsplein 45, 3013 AK Rotterdam, The Netherlands, Phone: +31 10 217 08 00, Fax: +31 10 280 96 20, Email: rudie@finalist.com

section.title: Overview
section.para:
The following services are available.
OrderInfoServiceService
OrderStatusServiceService
OrderStatusTypeServiceService
OrderTypeServiceService
ProductInfoServiceService
ProductTypeServiceService
RawMatarialServiceService
RawMatarialTypeServiceService
UserInfoServiceService
UserTypeServiceService

section.title: The service interfaces
section.para: This section describes all services that are available for

section.title: addOrderInfo
section.para: Adds a new orderInfo to the storage.

section.title: saveOrderInfo
section.para: Stores the OrderInfoIf.

section.title: deleteOrderInfo
section.para: Removes a orderInfo.

section.title: getOrderInfo
section.para: Retrieves a data object from the storage by its primary key.

section.title: getOrderInfoList
section.para: Returns a collection of all orderInfo instances.

section.title: getOrderInfoList(startIndex,endIndex)
section.para: Returns a subset of all orderInfo instances.

para.computeroutput: Collection getOrderInfoList(int startIndex, int endIndex) throws dbGarmentHibernate.exception.GenericBusinessException

section.title: getOrderInfoListSize()
section.para: Obtains the total number of orderInfo objects in the storage.

section.title: findOrderInfoByIdUser
section.para: Retrieves a list of data object for the specified idUser field.
